column5: Can anyone share waypoints for Bass on Rice Lake? Maybe through Garmin Active Captain? Not a tournament fishermen, just recreational catch/release and want to take my daughter out and catch some Bass... Thanks!
May have to go old school and trial and error like many of us learned find weeds, breaklines and rocks and give er a go
Shouldn't be hard to catch bass on Rice.  No need for other people's waypoints.
Jig and pig dunking (if anyone does it anymore lol ) weed pockets and flip the docks. Senkos work great weightless.
They can be found just about anywhere on the lake. Take a look at a map and maybe concentrate on weed flats and edges.
on my fishfinder my waypoints 4, 17, 18, 21, 25 and 27 are all spots you can find bass. Hope you get into some!
Mine: 1213, 1214, 1245, 1246, 1247. PM me if you want more.
Find a map of the lake and look for the old railway line, or try around the trees at the mouth of the Otonabee river. Good luck.
